title: innum enna sOdhanai
sahitya:
innum enna shOdanai en inba mannavA shivA vA vA



anupallavi



kanniyunnai nambiyuLLEn kAdalukku jAtyuNDO



caraNam



cArukEsi pOla mEgha rAshi paDarum nishiyil taDataDavenat tanti

pEshit-tAvu minnaliDiyil pOrum puyalum

shIrum ulagil pughalariyAdu pulambuginrEn puNNiyam uNDu kaNNiyam uNDU punnagai mukham kATTi  varuvAi
